marketplace.title: Page heading — plugin marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Page subheading — describes what you can do here
marketplace.wrapMcp: Button label — opens the MCP server wrapping wizard
marketplace.installLocal: Button label — install a plugin from a local manifest file
marketplace.loadingPlugins: Loading state text — fetching marketplace plugin list
marketplace.noPluginsAvailable: Empty state — marketplace has no plugins yet
marketplace.localManifestHint: Help text — explains local manifest install. Contains <code> HTML tag
marketplace.installLocalPlugin: Button label — confirms local plugin installation
marketplace.backToMarketplace: Navigation link — return to marketplace list
marketplace.published: Detail label — when the plugin was published. {{time}} is relative time string
marketplace.repository: Detail label — source code repository link
marketplace.builtFromSource: Parenthetical note — image was built locally, not pulled from registry
marketplace.imageDigest: Detail label — Docker image content hash
marketplace.imageUnavailable: Warning badge — Docker image cannot be pulled
marketplace.reinstall: Button label — reinstall an already-installed plugin
marketplace.buildAndInstall: Button label — build from source and install
marketplace.building: Button label — in-progress state while building
marketplace.localDev: Badge — plugin is installed for local development

viewport.pluginStopped: Empty state heading — plugin is not running
viewport.pluginError: Empty state heading — plugin has an error
viewport.startPlugin: Button label — start the plugin from empty state
viewport.headlessRunning: Heading — headless (no UI) plugin is running
viewport.headlessDesc_one: Description — headless plugin with one MCP tool (singular)
viewport.headlessDesc_other: Description — headless plugin with multiple MCP tools. {{count}} is tool count
viewport.mcpTools: Section heading — list of MCP tools provided by the plugin
viewport.inputSchema: Label — JSON schema for tool input

overlay.removing: Overlay heading — plugin is being removed
overlay.removingSub: Overlay subtext — describes what's happening during removal
overlay.stopping: Overlay heading — plugin is being stopped
overlay.stoppingSub: Overlay subtext — describes what's happening during stop
overlay.starting: Overlay heading — plugin is being started
overlay.startingSub: Overlay subtext — describes what's happening during start
overlay.rebuilding: Overlay heading — plugin is being rebuilt
overlay.rebuildingSub: Overlay subtext — describes what's happening during rebuild

menu.about: Menu item — show plugin info dialog. {{name}} is plugin display name
menu.remove: Menu item — remove plugin (destructive). {{name}} is plugin name. Ellipsis indicates confirmation follows
menu.logs: Menu item — show plugin container logs
menu.rebuild: Menu item — rebuild plugin from source
menu.autoRebuild: Menu item — toggle auto-rebuild on file changes
menu.enableDevMode: Menu item — turn on dev mode
menu.disableDevMode: Menu item — turn off dev mode
menu.manageExtensions: Menu item — navigate to extension management
menu.update: Menu item — update plugin/extension to latest version from registry
menu.updating: Menu item label shown while update is in progress (spinner visible)

about.author: Detail label — plugin author name
about.uiPlugin: Plugin type value — plugin has a user interface
about.headlessService: Plugin type value — plugin runs without a UI

controls.viewLogs: Tooltip — button to open logs panel
controls.rebuildFromSource: Tooltip — button to rebuild plugin from source code
controls.enableDevModeTooltip: Tooltip — button to enable developer mode
controls.disableDevModeTooltip: Tooltip — button to disable developer mode

mcpWrap.title: Wizard page heading — MCP server wrapping flow
mcpWrap.stepCommand: Wizard step label — enter the MCP server command
mcpWrap.stepTools: Wizard step label — review discovered tools
mcpWrap.stepDetails: Wizard step label — edit plugin metadata
mcpWrap.stepPermissions: Wizard step label — review inferred permissions
mcpWrap.stepBuild: Wizard step label — build and install the plugin
mcpWrap.commandDesc: Wizard instruction text — explains what this step does
mcpWrap.mcpServerCommand: Input label — the shell command to start the MCP server
mcpWrap.commandPlaceholder: Input placeholder — example MCP server command
mcpWrap.supportedRuntimes: Help text — which runtimes are supported. Contains <code> HTML tags
mcpWrap.discoverTools: Button label — start MCP tool discovery
mcpWrap.discovering: Button label — in-progress state during discovery
mcpWrap.zeroTools: Warning text — MCP server reported no tools
mcpWrap.toolsDiscovered_one: Success text — found one tool. Contains <strong> tag. {{count}} is 1
mcpWrap.toolsDiscovered_other: Success text — found multiple tools. Contains <strong> tag. {{count}} is tool count
mcpWrap.idValidation: Validation hint — allowed characters for plugin ID
mcpWrap.author: Input label — plugin author name
mcpWrap.reviewMetadata: Instruction text — review auto-filled plugin metadata
mcpWrap.deferredCount_one: Info text — one permission deferred to runtime (singular)
mcpWrap.deferredCount_other: Info text — multiple permissions deferred. {{count}} is number
mcpWrap.noPermissionsRequired: Info text — plugin needs no permissions
mcpWrap.firstBuildNote: Help text — first build may be slow
mcpWrap.pluginInstalledDesc: Success body — describes what was done and next steps
mcpWrap.goToPlugins: Button label — navigate to plugins page

extensions.title: Page heading — extension marketplace
extensions.subtitle: Page subheading — describes what you can do here
extensions.loadingExtensions: Loading state text — fetching extension list
extensions.noExtensions: Empty state — no extensions in marketplace
extensions.localManifestHint: Help text — how to install a local extension. Contains <code> HTML tag
extensions.installLocalExtension: Button label — install from local files
extensions.backToExtensions: Navigation link — return to extension list
extensions.unavailable: Badge — extension not available for this platform
extensions.reviewAndInstall: Button label — opens install review dialog
extensions.published: Detail label — publication time. {{time}} is relative time
extensions.authorAndSignature: Section heading — author info and signature status
extensions.publicKey: Detail label — ed25519 public key for signature verification
extensions.declaredCapabilities: Section heading — what the extension can do on the host
extensions.capabilitiesWarning: Warning text — extension runs as native process, review carefully
extensions.operations: Section heading — extension operations. {{count}} is operation count
extensions.scope: Detail label — operation scope. {{key}} is the scope key
extensions.installingExtension: Progress text — extension is being installed

installStatus.building: Progress overlay text — building Docker image and installing
installStatus.installing: Progress overlay text — installing plugin (no build needed)

logs.title: Panel heading — container logs
logs.noLogs: Empty state — no log output available

platforms.aarch64-apple-darwin: Platform label — macOS on Apple Silicon (ARM)

storage: Detail text — storage size used by plugin. {{size}} is formatted size string (e.g. '12.4 MB')

capability.process_exec: Capability name — can execute processes on the host
capability.file_read: Capability name — can read files from the host filesystem
capability.file_write: Capability name — can write files to the host filesystem
capability.network_http: Capability name — can make HTTP network requests
capability.system_info: Capability name — can read system information
capability.native_library: Capability name — can load native shared libraries
